definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

sentences.english: The people's government stands on a street in the west of Chengguan town.
sentences.chinese: 人民政府就在城關鎮靠西的那個街上。

sentences.english: You'd better report great events like this to the government.
sentences.chinese: 這麼大的事情，你最好彙報到城關鎮政府去。
